SEARCH
Package com.sc2002.model

Class EnquiryModel

java.lang.Object
com.sc2002.model.EnquiryModel
public class EnquiryModel extends Object
Represents a question or enquiry submitted by an applicant about a specific BTO project. It holds the enquiry details, submission info, and any response provided by an HDB staff member.

      When the enquiry was first submitted.

      private EnquiryResponseModel enquiryResponse

  • Constructor Details

    • EnquiryModel

      public EnquiryModel(String applicantNRIC, int projectID, String enquiryText)
      Creates a new enquiry instance. Automatically assigns a unique ID and sets the submission date to now. The response is initially null.
      Parameters:
      applicantNRIC - The NRIC of the applicant asking the question.
      projectID - The ID of the project the question is about.
      enquiryText - The applicant's question.

  • Method Details

    • getID

      public int getID()
      Gets the unique ID of this enquiry.
      Returns:
      The enquiry ID.

    • getApplicantNRIC

      public String getApplicantNRIC()
      Gets the NRIC of the applicant who submitted the enquiry.
      Returns:
      The applicant's NRIC.

    • getProjectID

      public int getProjectID()
      Gets the ID of the project this enquiry relates to.
      Returns:
      The project ID.

    • getStatus

      public boolean getStatus()
      Checks if the enquiry has been replied to.
      Returns:
      True if there is a response, false otherwise.

    • getEnquiryText

      public String getEnquiryText()
      Gets the text of the applicant's enquiry.
      Returns:
      The enquiry question.

    • replyEnquiry

      public void replyEnquiry(String officerResponse, int officerUserID)
      Adds a response to this enquiry. Creates and stores a new response linked to this enquiry.
      Parameters:
      officerResponse - The text of the response from the HDB staff.
      officerUserID - The ID of the HDB staff member who replied.

    • editEnquiry

      public boolean editEnquiry(String newEnquiryText)
      Allows the applicant to edit their submitted enquiry *before* it has been replied to. Updates the enquiry text and resets the submission date. Any previous response (if somehow added) is cleared.
      Parameters:
      newEnquiryText - The updated text for the enquiry.
      Returns:
      True, indicating the edit was processed (though success might depend on whether it was already replied to in a real scenario).

    • getFormattedEnquiry

      public String getFormattedEnquiry()
      Generates a formatted string containing all details of the enquiry and its response (if available). Useful for displaying the enquiry information to users.
      Returns:
      A string with the enquiry ID, submitter, project ID, dates, text, and response details (or pending status).
